mapper.select: SELECT MIN(f.f_date) AS oldest_date, MAX(f.f_date) AS recent_date, MIN(f.f_edate) AS oldest_edate, MAX(f.f_edate) AS recent_edate, c.c_name, c.c_num, c.c_num2, f.f_code, f.f_title, TRUNCATE(SUM(f.f_count), 0) AS countSum, FORMAT(TRUNCATE(SUM(f.f_price) / COUNT(*), 0), 0) AS avgPrice, FORMAT(SUM(f.f_count) * TRUNCATE(SUM(f.f_price) / COUNT(*), 0), 0) AS total FROM fooditem f JOIN category c ON f.c_num = c.c_num GROUP BY c.c_num, c.c_num2, c.c_name, f.f_title
